attributes.action: The UK Government to withdraw invitation to president Trump to visit UK
attributes.additional_details: President Trumps position on torture and targeting of people due to their religious beliefs are not compatible with the values and beliefs of the UK.  Allowing him to visit the UK would appear that the UK is supportive of, and would also  provide perverse credibility for his distorted views.
attributes.background: The UK Government to immediately withdraw invitation to president Trump to visit UK until such time as he renounces the use of torture and lifts the ban on Muslims entering the USA
